property.name: CardType
property.value: High Risk

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a 3D or greater maneuver. If played by Eddie Guerrero, Hardy Boyz, Matt Hardy or Jeff Hardy a 2D or greater maneuver. When successfully played, if your next card played this turn is a High Risk maneuver, your opponent's reversal to it is +8F.

property.name: CardType
property.value: High Risk

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Must be played after the card titled Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle. Reversals to this card are +2D. When successfully played, your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: CardType
property.value: High Risk

property.name: Card Text
property.value: The card titled From the Top Rope must be played before playing this card. When successfully played, you must take the top card from your Arsenal and put it into your Ringside

property.name: CardType
property.value: High Risk

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after the cards titled Roll Out of the Ring, Throw Opponent Out of the Ring, Announcer's Table, Baseball Slide, Giant Swing, or Suicide Plancha, or after a maneuver played after the card titled Irish Whip. When successfully played, opponent must discard 2 cards.

property.name: CardType
property.value: High Risk / Reversal: Special

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. May only reverse the cards titled Fireman's Carry or Samoan Drop. Can also reverse any card played after the card titled Irish Whip. If opponent has 5 or less cards in his Arsenal after the resolution of this card's damage, you win the game via a Pinfall Victory.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, if your next card played this turn is a maneuver it is +1D and your opponent's reversal to it is +1F; when played by Chris Benoit, you may also search your Arsenal for a card titled Chop to the Chest, place that card in your hand then shuffle your Arsenal.

card.name: Slap the Taste Out of Your Mouth

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Playable only if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. May not be reversed by the card titled Elbow to the Face. When successfully played, you may search your Arsenal for a card titled Shake It Off, put it in your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Strike / Reversal: Special

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only reverse the cards titled Double Leg Takedown and European Uppercut.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Foreign Object

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed by the cards titled Elbow to the Face, Double Digits, or Triple H's Reverse Neck Breaker.

card.name: Pop the Guy On the Apron

property.name: Traits
property.value: Tag logo

property.name: Card Text
property.value: To play this card you must be an 'inactive'player of your team and one of your 'inactive'opponent's must have a card titled Cheap Shot From the Corner, Trip, Partner Interference, That's Gonna Cost You!, Double Team, Propel Partner or Jump the Bell in his Ring area. Only your 'inactive'opponent may reverse this maneuver as usual, if he does he ends your 'active'partner's turn; otherwise he will take the damage.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed by the card titled Elbow to the Face. Reversals to this card are +2D. When reversed from your opponent's hand, if the first card played on his next turn is a maneuver, it cannot be reversed.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Strike / Reversal: Special

property.name: Traits
property.value: Foreign Object

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, you may put this card into your Ringside pile to reverse any Strike or Grapple maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Your opponent overturns 3 cards.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Strike / Reversal: Special

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after the card titled Irish Whip. When successfully played, if this card is not reversed from opponent's Arsenal, search your Arsenal for a card titled Hung Out to Dry, show it to your opponent, put it in your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal. If played from your hand, may reverse a maneuver played after the card titled Irish Whip.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a Strike maneuver. If the previous card played this turn was titled Stun Gun, your opponent's reversal to this maneuver is +15F. When successfully played, opponent must discard 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be reversed from your opponent's Arsenal when played after the card titled Irish Whip.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, discard 1 card and opponent must discard 2 cards.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Grapple / Reversal: Special

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only reverse the cards titled Kick, Superkick, and Spinning Heel Kick.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Grapple / Reversal: Special

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a reversal, reverse the card titled Back Body Drop and end your opponent's turn. When successfully played, your opponent discards 1 card. When he is Stone Cold Steve Austin, you may also look at his hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, you may search your Arsenal for the card titled Power Slam and put it in your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, if you discard 2 cards your next card played may not be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If not reversed from opponent's hand or Arsenal, search your Arsenal for a card titled DDT and put it into your hand. If DDT is not the next card you play this turn, end your turn.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Tag logo

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, a single 'inactive'tag team partner must discard 1 card. If that partner chooses, he may declare to 'tag'in as the 'active'partner at the resolution of this card's damage.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If successfully played against Stone Cold Steve Austin, he must discard 2 cards.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Grapple / Reversal: Grapple

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a reversal, reverse any Grapple maneuver and end your opponent's turn. When successfully played, your opponent discards 1 card. When successfully played by The Rock, search your Ringside pile and Arsenal for the card titled The People's Elbow, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. When successfully played, you may place a card titled Knee Breaker, Stump Puller, or Figure Four Leg Lock from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed by the card titled Clean Break. When played, prior to opponent's attempted reversal, discard any number of cards and add +2D for every card discarded to this maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be reversed by cards that specifically reverse the card titled Clutch onto Opponent. You cannot play the card titled Maintain Hold immediately after this card.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Submission / Action

property.name: Traits
property.value: Tag logo

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, when successfully played as the 'active'legal player of your team you may 'tag'in a partner. Your partner is now the 'active'legal player and may begin his turn. As an action, you may discard this card to draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Add +1D for every maneuver card with the word 'Arm' in the title in your Ring Area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a 4D or greater maneuver. When successfully played, you may draw 1 card and your opponent must discard 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played Submission maneuver. When played, this card is considered to have the same text as the previously played Submission maneuver for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, look through your Arsenal for a card titled Maintain Hold and place that card in your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal. If played by Dean Malenko this maneuver is -2F and +1D.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Foreign Object, Heel

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after the cards titled Throw Opponent Out of the Ring, Giant Swing or Announcer's Table. When successfully played, look through your Arsenal for a card titled Maintain Hold, put it into your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal. Your next card played this turn cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played by The Rock, this card is -2F. When successfully played, search your Arsenal for the card titled Maintain Hold, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, shuffle your Arsenal, and you may put 1 card from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile. When successfully played by The Rock, you may draw 1 card.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Reversal: Special

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any maneuver of 4D or less and end your opponent's turn. You may draw 1 card.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Reversal: Special

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by Stone Cold Steve Austin, The Undertaker, Deadman Inc, Kane, Two Man Power Trip, Big Show, Al Snow, Hollywood Hulk Hogan, Brock Lesnar, The Rattlesnake, Big Poppa Pump, Gene Snitsky, and Heidenreich. When played from your hand, reverse any maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Discard 2 cards.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Reversal: Special

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Stone Cold Steve Austin, The Undertaker, Deadman Inc, Kane, Tazz, Two Man Power Trip, The Rattlesnake, Big Poppa Pump, Gene Snitsky, or Heidenreich. Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. Blank that maneuver's text until the end of the turn and end your opponent's turn. Overturn cards equal to the maneuver's Damage. Draw up to 2 cards.

card.name: Kissing Up to the Stinkin' Fans

property.name: CardType
property.value: Reversal: Special

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any Face Action card if it is not the first Face action played this turn or if your opponent has at least 5 Face cards in his Ring area, and end your opponent's turn. Search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Reversal: Special

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any Heel Action card if it is the second one played this turn OR if opponent has five or more Heel cards in his Ring area. End opponent's turn. When played, opponent must discard 2 cards.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Reversal: Special

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If your Fortitude Rating is equal to or less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating you may reverse any Strike or High Risk maneuver and end your opponent's turn. If played from your hand, the first card played on your next turn is - #F, where # = F of the maneuver being reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put 1 non-unique Action or non-unique Maneuver card from your Ringside pile into your hand. If it is not the next card you play this turn, end your turn. When successfully played by Kurt Angle, the card does not have to be non-unique.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if you reversed a maneuver from your hand to end your opponent's last turn and this is the first card you play on your turn. You may search your Arsenal for any non-unique maneuver, show it to opponent, put it into your hand and then shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, your Submission maneuvers are +1D. When this card is in Kurt Angle's or Chris Benoit's Ring area, your Submission maneuvers are instead +3D.

card.name: Turn the Match into a Pier Six Brawl

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw 1 card. When this card is in your Ring area, all your Strike maneuvers are +2D. You may not have more than one Turn the Match into a Pier Six Brawl card in your Ring area at a time. If played by Rikishi or X-Pac, this action is -4F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw 1 card. When this card is in your Ring area, all your Grapple maneuvers are +3D. You may not have more than one Amazing Display of Power card in your Ring area at a time.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Choose up to 10 cards in your Ringside pile; your opponent returns 3 to your Ringside pile and the others you may shuffle into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, any successfully played maneuver by any player is +2D and the player may draw 1 card from his Arsenal. There may only be one card titled Let's Take it Home in all of the players' Ring areas at any time.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played by a Superstar with a total Superstar Value of 3 or less. You may draw 1 card; your opponent must discard 1 card and then put the top card of his Arsenal into his Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if your Superstar Value is 2 or less. Shuffle up to 4 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal or put 1 Mid-match card from your Ringside pile into your Backlash deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Tag logo

property.name: Card Text
property.value: To play this card you must be an 'inactive'player of your team. May only be played after a successfully played maneuver by your 'active'partner. If your partner's next card played this turn is a Strike or Grapple maneuver it is to be only considered as a High Risk maneuver and is +3D. Draw 1 card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Foreign Object

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a 4D or greater maneuver. When this card is in your Ring area, you may put this card in your Ringside pile and your next High Risk maneuver is +6D and considered to have +2 * (Stun Value). Reversals to this High Risk maneuver will be +4D. If played by Hardy Boyz, Matt Hardy or Jeff Hardy you may take 1 High Risk maneuver from your Ringside pile, put it in your hand.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Action / Reversal: Special

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, search your Arsenal for any 1 card, put it in your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal. Reveal your hand to your opponent. As a reversal, reverse any Action card that would allow your opponent to draw one or more cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: May not be played if your opponent is Kurt Angle. Look at opponent's hand. If you find any Face cards, opponent must discard them all to his Ringside pile. Then you may search his Arsenal and put any Face cards you find into his Ringside pile, then shuffle his Arsenal. If you don't find any Face cards in opponent's hand, do not search his Arsenal, and you must discard your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Active, Run-in

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played by Lita or if your opponent is Lita. When this card is in your Ring area, if your opponent reverses a maneuver of 4D or greater, you may put this card into your Ringside pile and continue your turn. If your next card played this turn is a High Risk maneuver, you can ignore the 'Can only be played after...' text. If a High Risk maneuver is not the next card you play this turn, end your turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if the Stun Value in your Ring area is greater than the Stun Value in your opponent's Ring area. Look at your opponent's hand, choose up to 2 cards, and your opponent discards the chosen cards. Draw up to 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if the last two cards you played this turn were 5D or greater Strike maneuvers. Cannot be played against a female Superstar. Cannot be reversed. Look at opponent's hand. Choose up to 2 cards in his hand, put them in his Ringside pile. At the start of each of his turns, opponent that has been 'Busted Wide Open,'must take the top 2 cards of his Arsenal and put them in his Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card can only be played if the total Stun Value in your Ring area is greater than the Stun Value in your opponent's Ring area. Search your Arsenal for any 2 non-unique maneuvers with a Stun Value, show your opponent and place them in your hand, then shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Foreign Object

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after the cards titled Roll Out of the Ring, Throw Opponent Out of the Ring, Baseball Slide, Giant Swing, or Suicide Palancha or after a maneuver played after the card titled Irish Whip. Return any maneuver from your Ringside pile to your hand. If the next card you play this turn is Drive Opponent Thru Announcer's Table or Piledriver it is +5D, and reversals to it are +20F.

card.name: I'm Gonna Put You Through the Ring

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed. If your next card played this turn is a Grapple maneuver of 10D or greater and it is not reversed from your opponent's hand, it does twice the damage.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may look at your opponent's Backlash deck. Select any 1 card and place it in his Ringside pile. Then select any 1 card in your Backlash deck and place it in your Ringside pile.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Pre-match Event

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You must take the top 4 cards from your Arsenal and put them into your Ringside pile. When the regular game sequence begins your (active) opponent must start the match with his hand face up on the table. At the end of your first turn your opponent may return his cards to his hand.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Pre-match Event

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You must take the top 2 cards from your Arsenal and put them into your Ringside pile. When this card is in your Ring area, you may put it in your Ringside pile as a Mid-match Action, then select one: look at your opponent's Backlash deck or his hand.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Pre-match Event

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, put this card into your Ringside pile and you may shuffle your hand into your Arsenal and draw # cards, where # is equal to the number of cards shuffled in. When played by Kane, Chris Jericho, Chyna, Kurt Angle, The Dudleyz Boyz, Buh Buh Ray Dudley, D-Von Dudley, Christian, Booker T, The Big Freak'n Machine, or Rey Mysterio draw 1 additional card.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Pre-match Event

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Overturn 5 cards. At the end of the Pre-match phase, put 1 card from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Pre-match Event

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, you may search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, shuffle your Arsenal, and randomly discard 1 card.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Pre-match Event

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, if you are not the player with the lowest Superstar Value, put this card into your Ringside pile. When this card is in your Ring area, as a Mid-match Action, you may put this card into your Ringside pile, draw 1 card, and your opponent's Reversal card to your next card played this turn is +8F.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Pre-match Event

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, you may place it in your Ringside pile as a Mid-match Action and choose any 4 cards in your Ringside pile and shuffle them back into your Arsenal.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Pre-match Event

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, if your tag team has the card titled Jump the Bell in your Ring area and your opponents do not, each member of your team may play an F:0 non-RMS maneuver against each member of the opposing team and it cannot be reversed. Active player targets active player, inactive player targets inactive player.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Pre-match Event

property.name: Card Text
property.value: The next Pre-match card your opponent plays is blank. At the end of the Pre-match phase, put that card into your opponent's Ringside pile.

card.name: Here a Mark, There a Mark, Everywhere a Mark Mark...

property.name: CardType
property.value: Pre-match Event

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Only playable if your Superstar Value is 5 or greater. When this card is in your Ring area, you may place it in your Ringside pile as a Mid-match action, then look at the top 5 cards of your Arsenal. Arrange those 5 cards in any order and place them back on top of your Arsenal, or shuffle them into your Arsenal.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Pre-match Event

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, the Superstar with the greatest total Superstar Value may force an opponent to take a number of cards equal to the greatest Superstar Value and put them into his respective Ringside pile. If no Superstar has a greater Superstar Value than the others then nothing occurs.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Pre-match Event

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played by Tazz. At the end of the Pre-match phase, if your Superstar Value is 2 or less, draw 3 cards. If you are not the player with the lowest Superstar Value, discard 1 card.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Mid-match Reversal: Special

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. Reverse any Strike, Grapple, or Submission maneuver if it is not the first maneuver played this turn and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Mid-match Strike

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. Cannot be reversed from your opponent's hand.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Mid-match Action

property.name: Traits
property.value: Foreign Object, Heel

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played Strike maneuver. Draw 1 card. When this card is in your Ring area all your Strike maneuvers are +1D. If you attempt to play any other maneuver card other than a Strike while this card is in your Ring area, put this card in your Ringside pile.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Mid-match Action

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if your opponent's Fortitude Rating is equal to or greater than your Fortitude Rating. When successfully played, every player must place all cards in their Ring area into their Ringside pile. (This card remains in the Ring.) You may draw 1 card. If played by Undertaker or Kane, this action is -10F.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Mid-match Action

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent cannot play the cards titled: No Chance in Hell, Borrring... Borrring... !!!, Giving Away the Business, Again With This Crap!?!?!, or V.K.M.'s Patented Big Gulp.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Mid-match Action

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when the regular game sequence begins and you start the game on your turn. This must be the first card you play. You may take up to 4 cards from your starting hand, shuffle them into your Arsenal and redraw the same number of cards.

card.name: When You Thought You Had All the Answers ...

property.name: CardType
property.value: Mid-match Reversal: Trademark Finisher

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played if a Trademark Finisher is in your Ring area. Reverse any Trademark Finisher, even if it cannot be reversed, and end your opponent's turn. It is shuffled into his Arsenal and he may draw 1 card.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Mid-match Reversal: Special

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any HEEL card played by your opponent, it is unsuccessful, must be placed in his Ringside pile, has no effect and ends his turn.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Mid-match Action

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating and you have a Pre-match Title Belt in your Ring area. Shuffle # cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal and draw 2 cards, where # is equal to your Superstar Value.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Mid-match Action

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, this card is -7F. Shuffle up to 4 Reversal cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal or, if you have no cards in your hand, you may instead draw up to 4 cards.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Mid-match Reversal: Special

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. Reverse any MANEUVER card or ACTION card that is not a Set-up card if your opponent already has a card in his Ring area with the same title. End your opponent's turn.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Mid-match Action

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver and if your Fortitude Rating is greater than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. If your next card played this turn is a maneuver, it cannot be reversed.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Dudley Boyz

property.name: Traits
property.value: Tag Team

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once per game, during your turn, you may search your Arsenal for 1 Foreign Object card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. Your card titled Brothers from Another Mother cannot be reversed. Your Foreign Objects are not Heel cards. You cannot pack any Title Belt except the Tag Team Title Belts. Your opponent cannot play the card titled Brotherly Love.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Trademark Finisher / Reversal: Special

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Dudley Boyz

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after the card titled Irish Whip. As a reversal, when played from your hand, reverse the card titled Irish Whip or any Strike or Grapple maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: CardType
property.value: High Risk

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Dudley Boyz

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played 5D or greater maneuver. Cannot be reversed. When successfully played, you may draw 1 card. When successfully played after a card with the word 'slam' in the title, you may also search your Arsenal for 1 card

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Buh Buh Ray Dudley

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Instead of drawing 1 card per turn, you may draw cards equal to the number of cards in both your opponent's and your Ring areas, less 2. However, you must discard your hand at the end of your turn.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Trademark Finisher / Reversal: High Risk

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Buh Buh Ray Dudley

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is considered a Grapple maneuver to your cards titled Table! Table! Table! As a maneuver, can only be played if the card titled Table! Table! Table! is in your Ring area or if it was in your Ring area immediately before you played this card. As a reversal, reverse any High Risk maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Buh Buh Ray Dudley

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal, search your Arsenal for half the number of cards you had, rounded down, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Buh Buh Ray Dudley

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to 5 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal and then end your turn or your opponent may draw 1 card.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Grapple / Reversal: Strike

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Dudley Boyz, Buh Buh Ray Dudley

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. As a reversal, reverse any Strike maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Strike / Reversal: Strike

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Dudley Boyz, Buh Buh Ray Dudley

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, if your next card played this turn is a Grapple maneuver, it cannot be reversed. As a reversal, reverse any Strike maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: D-Von Dudley

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you successfully play a maneuver, you may draw 1 card. Your opponent cannot play the card titled Brotherly Love.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: D-Von Dudley

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 5 cards from your Ringside pile into your hand and your opponent skips his next turn.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Strike / Reversal: Special

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: D-Von Dudley

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. As a reversal, reverse any maneuver played after the cards titled Irish Whip or Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Reversal: Strike/Grapple

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: D-Von Dudley

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any Strike or Grapple maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Discard your hand and draw # cards, where # is equal to the number of cards you had in your hand. # cannot be less than 4.

card.name: Thou Shall Not #### With the Dudleyz!

property.name: CardType
property.value: Reversal: Special

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Dudley Boyz, D-Von Dudley

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any card that would force you to discard any number of cards and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Mid-match Action

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Dudley Boyz, D-Von Dudley

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for the card titled Table! Table! Table!, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. Look at your opponent's hand, choose up to 2 Reversal cards, and your opponent discards the chosen cards.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Edge and Christian

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When a maneuver or reversal played causes you to discard any number of cards above 0, you may instead choose to reveal the cards you would have discarded and draw that many cards. You cannot play any title belts except the Tag Team Title Belts.

property.value: Cannot be reversed by the card titled When You Thought You Had All the Answers... Can only be played after a 4D or greater maneuver. When successfully played, opponent must discard 3 cards. If reversed, the first card played on your opponent's next turn cannot be reversed.

card.name: For the Benefit of Those with Flash Photography...

property.name: Card Text
property.value: # is equal to twice your opponent's Superstar Value. # cannot be less than 6. You start the game after the Pre-match phase. When you successfully play the card titled Faceplant, you may shuffle up to 4 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. When you successfully play the card titled You Think You Know Me?, do not discard any cards.

property.name: Card Text

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card counts as either a Pre-match Event or a Mid-match Action in your Backlash deck for the purposes of deck construction. Your Starting Hand Size is +2. At the end of the Pre-match phase, put this card into your Ringside pile. As an action, can only be played after the card titled Roll Out of the Ring. Draw up to 4 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may not play FACE or HEEL cards. You may reverse any FACE or HEEL Action card and end opponent's turn by discarding a card from your hand. Once during your turn, you may note the number of cards in your hand, place them on the bottom of your deck and draw the same number of cards. You may not play any title belt except the Tag Team Title Belts.

property.value: Eddie Guerrero

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played 5D or greater maneuver or if this is the first card played of your turn and you reversed a card from your hand to end your opponent's last turn. When successfully played and damage has been applied, if you have 5 or more cards in your hand than your opponent, you win the game via Pinfall victory.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed. Shuffle up to X cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal. Where X is equal to half, rounded up, of your opponent's Fortitude Rating.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: All players must shuffle the cards in their hand into their Arsenal and draw the same number of cards they shuffled into their Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, once per turn, you may discard 1 maneuver card and draw 1 card.
